name: bookmarking-app
description: A Bookmarking App using Electron, VueJs and sqlite3

scripts.rebuild-sqlite3-win32: cd node_modules/sqlite3 && npm run prepublish && node-gyp configure --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v46-win32-x64 && node-gyp rebuild --target=1.4.4 --arch=x64 --target_platform=win32 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/electron-v1.4-win32-x64

author: chaegumi
